available 1.1.0.9000

  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

available (development version)

available 1.1.0

CRAN release: 2022-07-10

  • Removed Urban Dictionary support, as the udapi package is set to be archived.

available 1.0.5

CRAN release: 2021-11-30

  • Gábor Csárdi is now the maintainer.

  • get_wikipidia() renamed to get_wikipedia().

  • valid_package_name() now correctly checks a package name according to CRAN policy (@KevCaz, #61).

available 1.0.4

CRAN release: 2019-07-19

  • Tests requiring network access are now skipped on CRAN.

available 1.0.3

CRAN release: 2019-07-01

  • BiocManager is now preferred to BiocInstaller if both are installed (#44, @luciorq).

  • create() now uses usethis::create_package() rather than the deprecated devtools::create().

available 1.0.2

CRAN release: 2018-11-08

  • Add dialog when run interactively asking if urban dictionary results should be included, as they can potentially contain offensive results (#41).
  • Use BiocManager for compatibility with future versions of R.

available 1.0.1

CRAN release: 2018-07-16

  • Filter own repo from GitHub results (#21).
  • get_urban_data() is now exported (#34).
  • No longer trimming r or R when proceeded by a vowel from search terms, as originally intended (#35).
  • Support for upcoming glue 1.3.0 release

available 1.0.0

CRAN release: 2017-11-17

  • Initial release

On this page

Developed by Carl Ganz, Gábor Csárdi, Jim Hester, Molly Lewis, Rachael Tatman, Posit Software, PBC.
